title: go.tools: build is broken
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

go get -v code.google.com/p/go.tools/cmd/...

What do you see instead?

# code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/gccgoimporter
.go/src/code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/gccgoimporter/parser.go:160: too many arguments in
call to types.NewPackage

# code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/ssa
.go/src/code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/ssa/testmain.go:35: too many arguments in call to
types.NewPackage

Which operating system are you using?

ArchLinux 64bits

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')

1.2
